patthana8.15:1.1_0: Nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.15:1.1_1: Nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.15:1.1_2: Nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasāsavo ca naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.15:2.1_0: Naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.15:3.1_0: Nasāsavañca naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.15:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
